name: CAVEFOG
description:
CAVEFOG is a procedurally generated cave environment, which can be explored from first person perspective. There is no goal, just get in and get lost.


Standard control scheme:

  • WASD - movement
  • Space - jump
  • Ctrl - crouch
  • Esc - pause and help

And also you can get higher quality screenshots with F key. The screenshots are saved within the game folder in CAVEFOG_Data folder.

Cavefog was created as a bachelor project for Game Design studies at Hochschule für Technic und Wirtschaft Berlin. The goal of this project was to learn procedural generation in Unity and improve my workflow with Substance Designer/Painter.

The prototype has it's quirks. Feedback is always welcomed, especially about performance.
